FuncDef: This command configures the lease time, in seconds, to be used when allocating addresses from the pool. This time value should always be longer than the renew/rebind time.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the lease time in seconds. Values-300 to 315446399.
Specifies the lease time in days. Values-1 to 3650.
Specifies the lease time in hours. Values-1 to 23.
Specifies the lease time in minutes. Values-1 to 59.
Specifies the lease time in seconds. Values-1 to 59.
